This key takes an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] as its value. # HKMetadataKeySyncVersion

**Global Variable**

The version number for a piece of data, used when updating or syncing.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeySyncVersion: String
```

## Discussion

This key takes an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] as its value. When you save an object to the HealthKit store, the new object replaces any matching objects (existing objects with a matching [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKMetadataKeySyncIdentifier] value) with a lower sync version.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKMetadataKeySyncIdentifier].

## Sync Keys

- **HKMetadataKeySyncIdentifier**: A unique string that identifies a piece of data so it can be updated and synced.
